name: Leger's Disdain
flavorText: The face within the center of the cross is the shrunken visage of an ancient priest of Rathma. He appears to be judging you unfavorably.
flavorTextHtml: The face within the center of the cross is the shrunken visage of an ancient priest of Rathma. He appears to be judging you unfavorably.

secondary.textHtml: Grim Scythe deals an additional 67% damage for each point of essence it restores. (Necromancer Only) [65 - 80]%
